medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Pain started around 9 am while at work, persisted throughout the day, and by 7 pm localized to the right lower quadrant (RLQ). Mild nausea without emesis was noted. The patient denies fevers, chills, constipation, diarrhea, urinary symptoms, or any sick contacts.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Allergic rhinitis, hypercholesterolemia, morning emesis (EGD negative); no previous surgeries.
medical_history.family_history: Father has renal cancer, sister with morning emesis.
